verbs.description: [V: is] rohrabacher trying to lose republican voters by caving on marijuana policy a former law enforcement officer questions her continuing support for the republican party if one of its longest - serving members of congress is going to try to weaken federal drug laws rohrabacher colorado los angeles times marijuana
